mapper.sql: USER_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, USER_CODE, STAFF_CODE, USER_EMAIL, USER_TEL, USER_NAME, USER_TYPE, USER_STATUS, USER_WENXIN, USER_DING, CREATE_TIME, CREATER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATER
mapper.select: SELECT max(USER_CODE) FROM SYS_USER A LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_ORG B ON(A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID) WHERE B.ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.USER_ID as userId, A.USER_CODE as userCode, A.USER_EMAIL as userEmail, A.USER_NAME as userName, A.USER_TEL as userTel, A.CREATE_TIME as createTime, A.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, C.ORG_NAME as orgName FROM SYS_USER A INNER JOIN SYS_USER_ARCHIVES D ON(A.USER_ID=D.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_ORG B ON(A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_ORG C ON(B.ORG_ID = C.ORG_ID)
1=1
and (B.ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR D.USER_DEP = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
LIMIT #{pageStart},#{pageEnd}

SELECT count(*) as count FROM SYS_USER A INNER JOIN SYS_USER_ARCHIVES D ON(A.USER_ID=D.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_USER_ORG B ON(A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_ORG C ON(B.ORG_ID = C.ORG_ID)
1=1
and (B.ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR D.USER_DEP = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_USER (USER_ID, USER_CODE, USER_EMAIL, STAFF_CODE, USER_TEL, USER_NAME, USER_TYPE, USER_STATUS, USER_WENXIN, USER_DING, CREATE_TIME, CREATER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATER) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userWenxin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into SYS_USER
USER_ID,
USER_CODE,
USER_EMAIL,
STAFF_CODE,
USER_TEL,
USER_NAME,
USER_TYPE,
USER_STATUS,
USER_WENXIN,
USER_DING,
CREATE_TIME,
CREATER,
UPDATE_TIME,
UPDATER,
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{staffCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userTel,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{userStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{userWenxin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userDing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update SYS_USER
USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAFF_CODE = #{staffCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TEL = #{userTel,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_STATUS = #{userStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_WENXIN = #{userWenxin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_DING = #{userDing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
